## DATA CLEANING
```{r}
#cleaning carbon
clean_carbon <- carbon %>% 
   mutate(across(.col=`2000`:`2022`, .fns= ~ as.numeric(.x))) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  select (C("country",`2000`:`2022`))
  

clean_carbon
```
